Params: Sparks fly as the two blades clash...
But this time, Lucia's blade becomes redirected and whirls into the air...
The enemy easily catches Lucia's blade in the air...
Then nails Lucia onto the wall, restraining her movements.
But the more she struggles, the more Construct vital fluids seep out from her pinned arm.
Your pain receptions are cut off...? How pitiable...
But your sorrow will end here... Lucia.
She casually parries the bullet and deflects it deep into the ruins. It stirs up a cloud of dust.
Up until now, she only had eyes for Lucia, but now her gaze slowly travels toward you.
Commandant... You're still a part of this farce...
Are you prepared to die for her?
Lee's suppressive fire does nothing to slow the enemy.
In just a flash, she is already standing right before your eyes.
But the enemy's blade easily pierces through your arm, in the same position as Lucia's wound.
So, "Commandant", do you really think you can stand in her shoes and understand her?
I... don't know what sort of answer you're looking for...
But I'll always entrust Commandant with my life.
That only means... the tragedy will go on.
I... look forward to your choice after learning about the truth...
...Well then, open your eyes and see the humans for who they really are through your precious "Commandant".
Having said that, the mysterious enemy sheaths her weapon as if losing all interest...
Then turns and walks back into the blinding sunlight.
She gazes at you meaningfully before completing vanishing into the light.
